insights.title: Total Transaction Volume
insights.description: **2.50 L** transactions totaling **₹32.79 Cr** with average size **₹1.3K**.
insights.why: Computed by summing all 250,000 rows in the dataset. Average = Total Value / Count.

insights.title: Monthly Growth Trend
insights.description: Average monthly growth: **+0.02%**. Compound monthly rate: **-0.04%**. Latest month: **+1.56%**.
insights.why: Growth rates computed as month-over-month percentage change. Compound rate uses formula: (Last/First)^(1/N)-1 over 12 months.

insights.title: Peak & Low Activity Periods
insights.why: Peak identified by finding the month with maximum total value. The +8.73% spread suggests moderate seasonality.

insights.title: Regional Dominance
insights.description: **Maharashtra** leads with **15.0%** of total value. Top 3 states control **38.9%**.
insights.why: Maharashtra dominates because it has the highest aggregate transaction value. Top 3 controlling 38.9% indicates moderate geographical concentration.

insights.title: Top Spending Category
insights.description: **P2P** dominates with **44.9%** of total transaction value (₹14.72 Cr).
insights.why: P2P leads because it has the highest sum of transaction amounts across all records. This reflects dominant spending in this category.

insights.title: Value Distribution & Skewness
insights.description: Distribution is **right-skewed (many small, few large)** (skew=3.92). Median: **₹629** vs Mean: **₹1.3K**. Top 5% of transactions hold **28.3%** of total value.
insights.why: Skewness of 3.92 means most transactions are small but a few very large ones pull the mean up. The gap between mean (₹1.3K) and median (₹629) confirms this.

insights.title: Transaction Failure Analysis
insights.description: Failure rate: **4.95%** (12.4K failed). Value at risk from failures: **₹1.68 Cr**.
insights.why: 12.4K transactions out of 2.50 L failed, representing ₹1.68 Cr in potentially lost value. This rate is within normal range.

insights.title: Fraud Risk Assessment
insights.description: **480** transactions flagged as fraudulent (**0.192%** rate). Fraud-flagged value: **₹7.20 L**.
insights.why: Fraud flag column indicates 480 suspicious transactions. Rate exceeds typical thresholds and should be monitored.

insights.title: Weekend vs Weekday Behavior
insights.description: Weekends account for **28.5%** of total value. Avg weekend txn: **₹1.3K** vs weekday: **₹1.3K**.
insights.why: Weekends (2/7 days = 28.6% of time) account for 28.5% of value. Lower than proportional — weekday activity dominates.

insights.title: Monthly Value Volatility
insights.description: Coefficient of variation: **2.3%** (low volatility). Stable month-to-month values indicate predictable transaction patterns.
insights.why: CV = Standard Deviation / Mean × 100 = 2.3%. Low CV means monthly totals are consistent and predictable.
